post:
Fastmako.com

My company wishes to make entry in the low end market. For this, we created a website only for these type of offers, and this is it’s first advertisement. We wish to take it in slow steps, to be sure this does not become some sort of summer host. We thank you beforehand for your trust, and we respect every customer, even if they decide to order or not.

Here are some of our offers:
(All offers are using KVM in Netherlands)

METERED OFFERS:

ROOT 1N

1 CPU Core
1 GB RAM
20 GB SSD Disk
1 TB Traffic
250 Mbps Bandwidth
€2.5/mo
order link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

ROOT 2N

1 CPU Core
2 GB RAM
40 GB SSD Disk
2 TB Traffic

€5/mo
order link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2

4 TB Traffic
500 Mbps Bandwidth
€10/mo
order link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3

MORE SUCH OFFERS: https://fastmako.com/pricing/
